title: Metro Last Light Update 9 (v.1.0.0.9) + Faction Pack DLC [RUSEN
description:
Information:
Game: Metro Last Light
Version Required: Only Metro Last Light Limited Edition [Steam-Rip] from RG Origins will work
Version: Update 9 (1.0.0.9)
Language: Russian, English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Polish, Czech, Dutch
Tablet: Is present (DeZoMoR4iN  RELOADED Steam Emulator)

DLC:
In Metro : Last Light Faction Pack will be three single mission for three different characters
from three different factions:
- The Sniper "Red Line"
- The Fighter "Reich"
- The Ranger "Polis"

Update 5 (v1.0.0.5) Change Logs:
- Added Faction Pack support.

Update 7 (v1.0.0.7) Change Logs:
- Fixed framerate drops with tesselation set to very High.
- Added hint and shortcut for DLC missions menu
- Added Difficulty menu on start of DLC missions.

Update 9 (v1.0.0.9) Change Logs:
- No idea.

Installation:
1. Install the game.
2. Install the update.
3. Copy the contents of the folder DeZoMoR4iN in a folder with a game.
4. Play.
